TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class Part : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel, System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Part extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor
Public MustInherit Class Part Inherits Panel Implements ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor, INamingContainer
public ref class Part abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Panel, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer, System::Web::UI::WebControls::ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor
type Part = class inherit Panel interface INamingContainer interface ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor

summary.span: 用作所有“Web 部件”部件控件的基类，这些控件在 Web 窗体页上呈现模块化用户界面。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all Web Parts part controls, which render a modular user interface on a Web Forms page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义所有部件控件通用的属性，并使其在网页上具有模块化和一致的外观。The class defines properties that are common to all part controls and enable them to have a modular and consistent appearance on a Web page. 这些通用属性包括标题、描述和部件控件周围的 chrome 或框架的特征。These common properties include a title, a description, and characteristics of the chrome or frame that surrounds a part control. 属性指定部件控件的标题。The property specifies a title for the part control. 属性用于汇总部件控件的用途，并在控件的标题栏中显示为工具提示。The property is used to summarize the part control's purpose, and appears as a ToolTip in the title bar of the control. 属性指示在部件控件周围呈现哪种类型的边框，而 属性指示部件控件是正常呈现还是最小化。The property dictates what kind of border is rendered around a part control, while the property indicates whether a part control is rendered normally, or minimized. 部件控件的边框受包含它的区域的属性的影响;例如， 属性会影响区域中包含的所有部件控件的帧。The border of a part control is affected by the properties of the zone that contains it; for example, the property affects the frames of all part controls contained in a zone. 一种类型的部件控件是 控件，它在相应的区域中呈现内容。One type of part control is the control, which renders content inside a corresponding zone. 另一种类型是 控件，该控件提供用户界面 (UI) 控件，这些控件用于修改 (个性化) 单个 控件。Another type is the control, which provides user interface (UI) controls used to modify (personalize) individual controls. 第三种类型的部件控件是 控件，它提供 用户可以在网页中添加或删除的控件列表。A third type of part control is the control, which provides a list of controls that users can add to or remove from a Web page. 部件控件包含在区域中，它们都派生自抽象 类。Part controls are contained in zones, all of which derive from the abstract class. 区域负责组织其包含的部件控件。A zone is responsible for organizing the part controls it contains. 每个区域还会为自身呈现 UI 元素，包括标题、页脚、标题栏和每个包含的部件控件周围的 UI 元素，如边框。Each zone also renders UI elements for itself, including a header, a footer, a title bar, and UI elements around each contained part control, such as borders. > [!NOTE] > 虽然部件控件通常位于区域中，但如果在网页的标记中以声明方式引用控件，则可以将部件控件置于区域外。While part controls usually reside in zones, it is possible to place a part control outside a zone, if the control is referenced declaratively in the markup of a Web page. 如果部分控件在网页上的某个区域外声明，则该控件仍然有效，但会丢失其大部分 Web 部件功能。If a part control is declared outside a zone on a Web page, the control still works, but loses most of its Web Parts functionality. 例如，控件无法编辑，并且不能在运行时拖到区域中。For example, the control cannot be edited, and cannot be dragged into a zone at run time. 另外，请记住，不能将任何部件控件从区域中拖放到区域外的某个页面上，而是在运行时。It is also helpful to remember that no part control can be dragged from a zone and dropped onto a page outside of a zone at run time. 下表显示了一些基本部件类型及其对应区域类型的示例。Some examples of base part types, and their corresponding zone types, are shown in the following table. |Part 控件类型Part control type|区域类型Zone type| |-----------------------|---------------| ||| ||| ||| 派生自类的各种不同类型的部件控件都 以不同方式处理继承的、面向 UI 的属性。The various kinds of part controls that derive from the class handle the inherited, UI-oriented properties differently. 控件重写几个继承的 UI 属性，并使用属性标记它们 `Personalizable` (有关详细信息，请参阅 类文档) ，它可为将来的浏览器会话（称为个性化的功能）保存这些属性的值。 controls override several of the inherited UI properties, and mark them with the `Personalizable` attribute (for details, see the class documentation), which enables the values of those properties to be saved for future browser sessions, a feature known as personalization. 例如，如果以编程方式使用户能够 在运行时更新控件属性的值 ，则该值将 (个性化，前提是启用了个性化设置，这是默认的) 。For example, if you programmatically enable a user to update the value of a control's property at run time, that value will be personalized (assuming that personalization is enabled, which is the default). 控制从类继承的或从类中继承的多个 UI 属性 的处理方式相同。Several UI properties that controls inherit from the class, and from the class, are handled the same way. 相反，其他部件控件（如 和 ）不能使继承的 UI 属性个性化。In contrast, other part controls, such as and , do not enable the inherited UI properties to be personalized. 出于此原因，不会为将来的浏览器会话保存以编程方式分配的属性值。For this reason, programmatically assigned property values are not saved for future browser sessions. 例如，如果以编程方式使用户能够 在运行时更新控件的属性，则在关闭控件或浏览器会话结束后，更新的值将丢失。For example, if you programmatically enable a user to update a control's property at run time, the updated value is lost after the control is closed or the browser session ends. 为将来的浏览器会话保存此类继承 UI 属性的值的简单方法 是将属性值声明为页持久性格式。An easy way to save the values on such inherited UI properties for and controls for future browser sessions is to declare the property values in page persistence format. 但这是一种静态方法，并且仍不允许用户个性化属性值。However, this is a static approach and still does not allow users to personalize the property values. 作为替代方法，如果想要对继承的 UI 属性启用编程更新，以便用户可以在运行时对其进行个性化设置，则可以使用私有静态变量来保存属性值。As an alternative, if you want to enable programmatic updates to the inherited UI properties so users can personalize them at run time, you can use private, static variables to save the property values. 每次 创建或控件的新实例 (例如，在处理控件的 事件) 方法中，可以将静态变量的值重新分配给相应的属性。Each time a new instance of an or control is created (for example, in the method that handles the control's event), you can reassign a static variable's value to a corresponding property. 这种方法使用户能够个性化 Web 部件应用程序的编辑 UI 和目录 UI。Such an approach gives users the ability to personalize the editing UI and catalog UI of a Web Parts application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何 使用 ASP.NET 网页中引用的自定义控件的两个实例来声明类的多个属性的声明性用法。The following code examples demonstrate declarative use of several properties of the class, by using two instances of a custom control referenced in an ASP.NET Web page. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 该示例的第一部分包含名为的自定义控件的代码 `TextDisplayWebPart` 。The first part of the example contains the code for the custom control, named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 由于控件派生自 ，因此它还继承类提供的公共属性 ，并阐释了此代码示例中这些属性的用法。Because the control derives from , it also inherits the common properties that the class provides, and illustrates the use of those properties in this code example. [!code-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何在 ASP.NET 网页中引用自定义部件控件。The second part of the example shows how to reference the custom part controls in an ASP.NET Web page. 请注意，将以 声明方式将各种属性分配给自定义控件实例。Notice that the various properties are assigned declaratively to the custom control instances. 比较引用页面上两个实例的声明性代码，然后在浏览器中加载该页面。Compare the declarative code that references the two instances on the page, and then load the page in a browser. 请注意各个属性如何影响控件的外观。Note how the various properties affect the appearance of the controls. 例如，在浏览器中加载页面后，控件的第二个实例 `TextDisplayWebPart` 将显示最小值，因为其 属性值设置为 。For example, after you load the page in a browser, the second instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control appears minimized, because its property value is set to . [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 通常，不应直接从 类继承来开发自定义 Web 部件控件。

span.span: Normally, you should not inherit directly from the class to develop custom Web Parts controls.

para.span: 若要提供完全 Web 部件功能，Web 部件控件集需要从类派生的类 ，例如 、 和 ，因此，你应从类派生以开发自定义控件。

span.span: To provide full Web Parts functionality, the Web Parts control set requires the classes derived from the class, namely , , and , so you should derive from them to develop custom controls.

para.span: 但是，了解基类的行为仍然很重要 ，因为它提供了一组通用的属性，这些属性由所有其他部件类使用。

span.span: However, it is still important to understand the behavior of the base class, because it provides a common set of properties used by all other part classes.
ASP.NET Web Parts Overview
Web Parts Control Set Overview
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 获取或设置部件控件是处于最小化状态还是正常状态。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a part control is in a minimized or normal state.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部件控件 可以是正常或最小化。A part control's can be normal or minimized. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了部件控件中的属性的声明性用法 。The following code example illustrates the declarative use of the property in a part control. 此示例需要自定义 控件 `TextDisplayWebPart` ，该控件可在类摘要的 "示例" 部分中找到 。This example requires the custom control `TextDisplayWebPart`, which can be found in the Example section of the class summary. 请注意，在网页的声明性标记中，该控件的第二个实例 `TextDisplayWebPart` 将设置其 属性。Note that in the declarative markup for the Web page, the second instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control sets its property. 在浏览器中加载页面后，第二个控制实例会最小化显示。After you load the page in a browser, the second control instance appears minimized. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The value specified is not one of the values.

para.span: 派生类（如） 可以重写 ，以启用控件的边框状态的用户个性化设置。

span.span: Derived classes such as can override to enable user personalization of the control's border state.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Property ChromeType As PartChromeType

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType ChromeType { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置构成 Web 部件控件的框架的边框类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of border that frames a Web Parts control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部件控件的 属性确定控件周围的边框类型。A part control's property determines what kind of border surrounds the control. 选项包括仅显示标题、仅显示边框、标题和边框、不显示或默认选项（只使用属性的值） 。Options include showing a title only, a border only, a title and border, neither, or the default option, which simply uses the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了部件控件中的属性的声明性用法 。The following code example illustrates the declarative use of the property in a part control. 此示例需要自定义 控件 `TextDisplayWebPart` ，该控件可在类摘要的 "示例" 部分中找到 。This example requires the custom control `TextDisplayWebPart`, which can be found in the Example section of the class summary. 在网页的声明性代码中，控件的第二个实例 `TextDisplayWebPart` 将其 属性设置为仅具有标题，而第一个实例具有标题和边框。In the declarative code for the Web page, the second instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control sets its property to have only a title, whereas the first instance has a title and a border. 在浏览器中加载页面后，该控件的第二个实例将显示为最小化。After you load the page in a browser, the second instance of the control appears minimized. 如果将控件最大化，则会显示不带边框的标题。If you maximize the control, it shows a title without a border. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

para.span: 派生类（如） 可以重写 ，使用户能够个性化设置框架的边框类型。

span.span: Derived classes such as can override to enable user personalization of the kind of border that frames a control.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Controls As ControlCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::ControlCollection ^ Controls { System::Web::UI::ControlCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象包含用户界面层次结构中指定服务器控件的子控件。

span.span: Gets a object that contains the child controls for a specified server control in the user interface hierarchy.

value.span: 指定服务器控件的子控件的集合。

span.span: The collection of child controls for the specified server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 页上，如果在服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间以声明方式添加控件，则 ASP.NET 会自动将控件添加到包含服务器控件的 对象。On an ASP.NET page, when controls are added declaratively between the opening and closing tags of a server control, ASP.NET automatically adds the controls to the containing server control's object. 未在服务器上处理的任何 HTML 标记或文本字符串都将被视为 对象。Any HTML tags or text strings that are not processed on the server are treated as objects. 这些将添加到集合中，如其他服务器控件。These are added to the collection like other server controls. 属性允许你以编程方式访问 任何服务器控件的类的实例。The property allows you programmatic access to the instance of the class for any server control. 您可以向集合添加控件、从集合中移除控件或循环访问集合中的服务器控件。You can add controls to the collection, remove controls from the collection, or iterate through the server controls in the collection.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void DataBind() cil managed

summary.span: 将数据源绑定到调用的服务器控件及其所有子控件。

span.span: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Description { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property Description As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一条短语，该短语在部件控件的工具提示和目录中用来概述该部件控件的作用。

span.span: Gets or sets a brief phrase that summarizes what the part control does, for use in ToolTips and catalogs of part controls.

value.span: 一个字符串，简要概述部件控件的功能。

span.span: A string that briefly summarizes the part control's functionality.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常是在提供部件控件列表的目录中使用的字符串，在部件控件的标题栏中为工具提示。The property is typically a string that is used in catalogs that provide lists of part controls, and as a ToolTip in the part control's title bar. 当你将鼠标指针置于部件控件的标题栏中的标题文本上时，的内容将显示在工具提示中。The content of the appears in a ToolTip when you position your mouse pointer over the title text in a part control's title bar. 工具提示文本是从属性的值创建的 ，后跟连字符，然后是 属性值。The ToolTip text is created from the value of the property, followed by a hyphen, followed by the property value. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了部件控件中的属性的声明性用法 。The following code example illustrates the declarative use of the property in a part control. 此示例需要自定义 控件 `TextDisplayWebPart` ，该控件可在类摘要的 "示例" 部分中找到 。This example requires the custom control `TextDisplayWebPart`, which can be found in the Example section of the class summary. 在浏览器中加载页面后，如果将鼠标指针放在第一个控件实例的标题文本上，则说明文本将显示在工具提示中。After you load the page in a browser, if you position your mouse pointer over the title text of the first control instance, the description text appears in a ToolTip. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 派生类（如） 可以重写 ，以启用控件说明的用户个性化设置。

span.span: Derived classes such as can override to enable user personalization of the control's description.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Title { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置部件控件的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of a part control.

value.span: 一个表示部件控件的标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the title of the part control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部件控件的标题栏中的可见标题文本由 属性设置。The visible title text in a part control's title bar is set by the property. 将鼠标指针置于 控件或区域中显示的其他服务器控件的标题栏上方时，标题文本也会显示为工具提示文本的一部分 。The title text also appears as part of the ToolTip text when you position your mouse pointer over the title bar of a control or other server control that appears in a zone. 标题文本的样式由 包含部件控件的区域的属性确定。The style of the title text is determined by the property of the zone that contains the part control. 如果没有为控件提供标题，则 Web 部件控件集会自动计算要用作标题的默认字符串。If you do not supply a title for a control, the Web Parts control set automatically calculates a default string to use as a title. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 此外，还可以提供附加到标题字符串的标准副标题。Also, it is possible to provide a standard subtitle that is appended to the title string. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For details, see . 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了部件控件中的属性的声明性用法 。The following code example illustrates the declarative use of the property in a part control. 此示例需要自定义 控件 `TextDisplayWebPart` ，该控件可在类摘要的 "示例" 部分中找到 。This example requires the custom control `TextDisplayWebPart`, which can be found in the Example section of the class summary. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 派生类（如） 可以重写 ，以启用标题的用户个性化设置。

span.span: Derived classes such as can override to enable user personalization of the title.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
